subtitleNullable: A big wikiart set of images and correspondent dataset
descriptionNullable:
This dataset contains the majority of artworks at wikiart.
This includes sculptures, photos, illustrations and others. Also includes a column with the website tags, so various kinds of classification or NLP are possible.

The file folder contains the images in medium to small sizes so they don't take up lots of disk space and be more manageable for machine learning.
It contains 176436 images, the CSV file contains classification by genre, movement and artist. The original URL to the wiki page referring to the image is included as well as a direct link to the image.
title: WikiArt all artpieces
subtitle: A big wikiart set of images and correspondent dataset
description:
This dataset contains the majority of artworks at wikiart.
This includes sculptures, photos, illustrations and others. Also includes a column with the website tags, so various kinds of classification or NLP are possible.

The file folder contains the images in medium to small sizes so they don't take up lots of disk space and be more manageable for machine learning.
It contains 176436 images, the CSV file contains classification by genre, movement and artist. The original URL to the wiki page referring to the image is included as well as a direct link to the image.
